result.title: Plan for collaboration with other I4MS projects and Digital Innovation Hubs update M12
result.description: Plan for liaison and co-operation activities with other projects that will contribute to the I4MS and Digital Innovation Hubs initiatives. An initial plan for collaboration will be made in M4, and in M12 and M30 progress report an update will be provided on the activities done and the plans for the next period.
